project.name: C-C476G-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C476G-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Good inputs: 1) taintvar is less than 64 characters long.Bad input: 1) taintvar is greater than or equal to 64 characters long.
